dcterms:creator: A. Ng
M. Jordan
Y. Weiss
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset where nodes represent papers and edges correspond to citations. The features are binary vectors indicating the presence or absence of words in the papers.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: A. Ng
M. Jordan
Y. Weiss
dcterms:description: Pubmed is a citation network dataset where nodes represent papers and edges correspond to citations. The features are represented by tf-idf weights indicating the importance of words in the papers.
dcterms:title: Pubmed
